alert.note: Alert for Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 1:11AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHEAST SUFFOLK COUNTY... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 111 AM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from Riverhead to near Southampton and moving east at 35 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Southampton, Shinnecock Hills, Hampton Bays and Water Mill. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
